Title: Relates to certification required for payments made for home care services
Summary: Requires an annual statement of wage parity hours and expenses to be accompanied by an independent accountant's report on applying agreed upon procedures on the annual compliance statement of wage parity, hours and expenses prior to payments for home care services by government agencies.
LawCode: Amd ยง3614-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to home care worker wage parity
